name: Shield Material Mastery
text: Your extraordinary understanding of the special materials from which your shield is made lets you take advantage of it more often.
prerequisites: Shield Focus, Shield Material Expertise, base attack bonus +11 or fighter level 8th.
benefit: You can use the ability granted by Shield Material Expertise two additional times per day.
text_zh: 你出众的专业知识使你能够更加频繁地使用由特殊材料带来的能力。
prerequisites_zh: 盾牌专攻，盾牌材料专家，BAB+11或者战士8级。
benefit_zh: 每天额外2次使用由盾牌材料专家专长带来的特殊能力。
